extendedInfo.description: Do you have what it takes to pick the president?In the race to the White House in 2012, you decide who is worthy enough for the Oval Office. Play as your favorite presidential candidate in this Street Fighter styled fighting game, either Obama or Romney.You will travel across the country to various swing states where you will duel to determine the winner. The eventually goal is to capture the presidency in November.Control each candidate with intuitive tap controls and continuous combo sequences.This game is completely free! Spread the word if you enjoy it and email the developer if you are interested in becoming a sponsor.This game designed to be compatible with most Android touchscreen devices and if you enjoy such popular titles as super smash bros, tekken, street fighter, fruit ninja, ant smasher, cut the rope, ninjump, fruit shoot, killer instinct, clay fighter, capcom, goldeneye, mortal kombat or CNN mobile, Civic Incivility will be a great addition to your collection.KW: political, fighting, barack, mitt, country, USA, king, election, 2012, November, president, debate, news, government, unique, politics, versus, vs, vote, white house, washington

reviews.title: Cool game

reviews.title: Civic Incivility :)
reviews.comment: This game rocks! Been playing it since it first came out! Love the graphics & hilarious sound effects! When I voted, I couldn\'t stop laughing because I had this game in mind. Told all my friends & family about the game. This is a keeper!
reviews.author: Kiko Yoyo
